captions.text:
- Well, hello everyone,
my name is Tyler Oakley,
and it is time for another Q and Slay.

Tyler_MyQueen would like to
know, "Why do most superheroes
"wear their underpants on the outside?"
I mean, let's get real.
This is kind of like a good look.

Mary would like to know,
"Do you get a lot of time to
"watch other YouTuber's stuff?"
That's a good question.

I don't really watch a lot
of TV, because I spend most
of my time watching YouTube.

Their lives are more
interesting than any TV show
that I could watch (laughs) on my TV.
Lindsey would like to know, "Did a potato
"fly around your room?"
Yeah, girl...
♫ A potato flew around the room ♫
(mumbled singing)
To answer the question, Lindsey, yes.
A potato flew around, caused some havoc.

I sliced it up, diced it
up, ate it up real quick.
Dipped it in a little bit of ketchup.

But it still did fly around
my room and make a mess.

Ersatz would like to know,
"Now that you color your hair,
"and it's so much a part of your brand,
"do you ever feel trapped by it?"
Yes and no, it's hard to explain.

Like, sometimes I feel like,
I wonder how it would be
to have normal colored hair anymore,

because I have had this,
like, mop of fun, bright stuff

on the top of my head for
about a year and a half.

And I love how it looks,
and it's fun to have.

And it's very much a part
of how I identify now,

whether it's bright blue
or green or purple or
whatever color it is.
But yeah, it would sometimes be nice
to have normal-colored hair.

If it's blue right now, I don't
normally wear blue on blue,
because it's a lot of blue going on.

'Cause this is more like
a fluorescent radiation
Go-Gurt type of blue.
This is more like a ripe blueberry
in the summer type of blue.
So, I can wear them at the same time.

But yeah, no, I love every
minute of having fun hair.

I mean, I'm gonna do it as
long as I still like it.
And I still like it, so...

kit-KAT would like to
know, "What was it like
"to meet Jessie J?"

And this is the surprise that
I wanted to tell you guys,

but I wanted to keep a secret
until I could tell you guys.

But then the day that it
happened, Jessie J herself
posted a video on Instagram about it.

So, I was like, "I guess
the cat's out of the bag."

So basically what happened
was I got to go and
hang out with Jessie J herself.

And I did a little interview
with her, which is right here.

- Ready.
- Let's do it.
- Favorite board game.
- Oh, Scattergories. (laughs)
- Favorite living musician.
- Uh, today, Prince.
- Biggest turnoff.

- Unhygienic.
- Last hobby you picked up.

- Baking.
- Okay.

Least favorite food.
- Raw onions.
- Favorite Beyonce song.
- Uh, Love on Top.
- How do you feel about horses?

- Horses?
- Yeah.

- Meh, so-so.
- Nay?
Favorite dessert?

- I don't really like dessert.
- Oh, girl.

- Like fondue, melted chocolate,
things you can dip in it.
- When were you the most nervous?
- The Olympics.

- If your life was a song,
what would be the title?
- Everything happens for a reason.
- Okay, beautiful.
- All right, ready?
Favorite movie of all time.
- Oh, "500 Days of Summer".
- That's a good film.

If you could have one super
power, what would it be?

- Uhh, flight.
- Favorite app.
- Oh, Grindr?
- What are you doing tomorrow?

Whoa...
- I know.
(both laugh)
Ask me, come on.
- What are you doing tomorrow?

- Going to Disneyland.
- Oh, wow.
Best thing about 2014.
- Interviewing you.
- Aw, that's such a lie.

Do you have tattoos?
- None.

- Ugliest breed of dog?
- Oh my gosh.
Like, a shih tzu.

- What's the coolest
thing you've ever seen?

- My own birth.
- Whoa!
What is your spirit animal?
- Lady Gaga.
- Your spirit animal is Lady Gaga?
- In, like, a million wigs.

- I don't know if that's
a compliment or not.
One last one.
If you could sing a duet with anyone,
who would it be?
- You know, it would have to be you.

We did that right before
we started, though.
♫ Ooh
♫ Ooh ♫

- See?
- Yeah!
There we got it.

And we even got to play
Just Dance 2015 to her song,
"Bang Bang", which was too much.
Check it out.
So, the song is so amazing, "Bang Bang",
that it's even featured in Just Dance.
- I know, I can't wait!
- We actually danced to the song,
so if you want to dance along with us.

- Make sure you warm up,
'cause it's not easy.

- It's not easy!
- And I've got these, so...
♫ Phone ranging he slanging
♫ It ain't karaoke night but get the mic
♫ 'Cause I'm sangin'
♫ B to the A to the N to the G to the uh
♫ B to the A to the N to the G to the ♫

- So yeah, if you wanna
play with me and Jessie J

in the game, you can do
that starting December 12th,
which is incredible and weird
and amazing all at the same time.

- So, if you want to get the
game, I have it right here.
It's available on Wii and PS4 and XBOX.

So if you want to get
it, the link's below.

Radclifford would like to know,
"Are you Christmas as fuck?"

And yes, I think I answered
this on the last Q&A,

but I am still remaining
Christmas as fuck.

Because I just hit 100,000
followers on Spotify.

And to celebrate, I thought
I would give you guys
a special little treat, and that is a
whole Christmas playlist.

And it's all holiday music
curated just for you guys.
So, if you want to check it out,
the link to my Spotify is below.
Follow me, and follow my playlists.
I have a jams playlist, a Jill playlist,
and then, now, a Christmas playlist.

So, check it out, let
me know what you think
and what songs I am missing, let me know.

Actually yeah, let me
know in the comments,
what is your favorite holiday song?
That's a good question; I need to know.
If you have one that's like, super good,
I'll add it to my Spotify.

Lily would like to know, "What
do you think of this picture
"I took in your honor?"
I love it!
I, as you guys know, every time I go to a
special place in the world...
What are those called?
Like a...
Monument or a world wonder?
Landmark! That's the word.

Any time I go to a
landmark, I do this pose,
like Leaning Tower of Pisa pose.

These are all the pictures
that I've ever taken
around the world doing that pose.

And then I finally this
year got to do it with

the actual leaning tower,
but it became a thing,

and now you guys
sometimes send me pictures

of you guys with landmarks
around the world doing it.

So, if you ever go to a
landmark, send me a picture,
because I want to see that stuff.

My buddy, Ben J. Pierce says,
"Do you have any kind words
"regarding the passing of Zoboomafoo?"
Zu-boh-ma-foe?

I don't know how to pronounce
it, but apparently, okay...

So, I saw trending on
Twitter, "RIP Zoboomafo".
Zo-boom-afoo? (mumbles)

And I was all like,
"What the fuck is this?"

So, I googled it, and
it was like, a monkey,
a lemur, whatever.
And everyone's all like crying about it,
because it was part of their childhood.

But I did not feel this 'cause
I've never seen the show.
And if anything, I saw the picture,
and it looked like a puppet.

So, I was all like,
"Why are you all crying
"that a puppet has gone?"
But apparently it's a real lemur.

But I had said, "It
doesn't matter what type of

"animal it is, if it's
dead, it's fair game to be
"dipped in some ranch and eaten."
Can I not say that?
Apparently I can't, because the whole PBS
fandom was coming for me.
The whole Zobooma-fandom was like rabid.
Listen, I'm sorry, Zobomo-flo-men.

Honestly, if this was a
part of your childhood,
I'm sorry for your loss.
Za-bama-flama is in a better place,
and God bless.

Sofacouchie would like to
know, "Even if I didn't get

"VIP tickets to the Slumber
Party Tour, is there still

"a chance to meet you if I
get tickets to your show?"
Yes!

A lot of people are like, "Ugh,
I couldn't get VIP tickets
"because they sold out so quick."

During the show, I have a
little competition giveaway.
And you never know what's gonna happen.

Because, I might just
give away a whole bunch of
backstage passes for after the show
for the people in the best onesies

or maybe some people that
are chosen at random.
You never know what's gonna happen
at the Slumber Party Tour.

Just because you don't
get VIP doesn't mean

you won't get a chance
to come take a selfie
with me after the show, just sayin'.

So yes, if you would like to
get tickets, the link is below.
Again, get 'em quick.

But yes, that is all I
have for you guys today.
I hope you have a fabulous life.

And if you would like to give
me a little bit of love today,

be sure to give the thumbs
up button a little click.

I'm gonna wait right
here for you to do it.
Bam done, okay cool.

If you would like to see my
latest video, click right there.
It's a little bit of advice for you guys,

and a little bit of love, a
little special little moment.

So, if you want to watch
that, click right there.

If you would like to
hear the latest podcast,
it is right there.
Click it, and subscribe on iTunes.
It is all about Thanksgiving.
So, listen to that right there.
And if you want to be my person
of the week, click right there.

But yes, that is all I have
for you guys this week.
I hope you have a fabulous life,
and I will see you guys later.
Bye!

Psst! Go get tickets to
the Slumber Party Tour.
It's next week, I think.
Is it next week?
It's almost, yeah, coming up!
Get tickets right now!
